sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GetButtonTable</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GetButtonTable</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GetButtonTable = Class.create();
GetButtonTable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getButtonTableName: function() {
		var buttonId = this.getParameter('sysparm_button_id');
		if (!buttonId)
			return "";

		var msg = "";
		var buttonGR = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_button");
		if (!buttonGR.canRead()) {
			gs.warn("Cannot read table: sys_sg_button");
			msg = gs.getMessage("Security constraints prevent access to table");
			gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
			return "";
		}

		buttonGR.get(buttonId);
		if(!buttonGR.isValidRecord()) {
			gs.error("Invalid button: " + buttonId);
			msg = gs.getMessage("Button not found");
			gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
			return "";
		}

		if (!buttonGR.canRead()) {
			gs.warn("Cannot read record: " + buttonId);
			msg = gs.getMessage("Security constraints prevent access to record");
			gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
			return "";
		}

		var buttonTableGE = buttonGR.getElement("table");
		if (!buttonTableGE.canRead()) {
			gs.warn("Cannot read field: table");
			msg = gs.getMessage("Security constraints prevent access to field");
			gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
			return "";
		}

		return buttonGR.table;
	},
    type: 'GetButtonTable'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-05-23 12:23:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8b54c234b7121300897725cbde11a95f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GetButtonTable</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8b54c234b7121300897725cbde11a95f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-05-01 11:29:19</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1191</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
